description: ?Black Velvet? ? The ?Film of Films? featuring ?Big Bill? (Bill Harrison) of ?Bijou? fame and ?Playgirl? discovery John Traynor! The sheer SIZE of Big Bill's supercock has to be seen to be believed, as he punishes John to the hilt, fore 'n aft, in a pair of the most turn-on films ever made.
title: Black Velvet - The Big Deal Part 1, Scene #02
